title: (waku peer exchange?) segmentation fault (core dumped)
body:
# Bug Report

## Description

Segmentation fault.

## Steps to reproduce

Not sure, likely related to lack of connection and sleep time.

#### Expected behavior

no segfault

#### Actual behavior

yes segfault

### Additional Information

- Status desktop version: 0.9.0
- Operating System: Linux Fedora

